entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
